description:
Risei is Kotomine Kirei`s 80 year old father, a priest in the Church and the regulator of the 4th Holy Grail War. He is a friend of Tousaka Tokiomi and actively supports him. While he is proud of his son, who has demonstrated himself to be a perfect heir, Risei fails to understand Kirei in any sense.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kotomine Risei
